pages.text: brooms are magical devices commonly used by witches. through the use of me, they enable the user to fly through the skies.$(br2)brooms come in four variants, each with unique properties.
juniper brooms are the fastest of all brooms, without any other special properties.
cypress brooms ward the user, reducing both damage input and output.
elder brooms will return the user to where they mounted it after dismounting.
dragon's blood brooms can have active sigils applied to them, much like any other dragon's blood block.
